channel.title: Album Endpoint on Music Database
channel.description: Recent content in Album Endpoint on Music Database

item.title: Album
item.description: Album The Model type Album struct { ID uuid.UUID `json:"id"` Copyright string `json:"copyright"` IsComplete bool `json:"isComplete"` IsSingle bool `json:"isSingle"` Name string `json:"name"` RecordLabel string `json:"recordLabel"` ReleaseDate time.Time `json:"releaseDate"` TrackCount int `json:"trackCount"` CreatedAt time.Time `json:"createdAt"` UpdatedAt time.Time `json:"updatedAt"` } Copyright The copyright text. IsComplete (Required) Indicates whether the album is complete. If true, the album is complete; otherwise, it is not. An album is complete if it contains all its tracks and songs.

item.title: Album Artists
item.description: Create or Link Artist to Album This endpoint allows you to Link an Album -> Artist relation or create a new Artist with Relation. If no id is provided a new Artist will be created. POST /api/albums/{albumID}/artists If the Artist you want to link exists you can POST { "id": "1607d150-861c-4782-8c1b-abe58254373b" } If you want to create a new Artist: Request { "ipi": "withIpi", "isni": "withIsni", "sortName": "abca!", "name": "ultra performant artist!

item.title: Album Tracks
item.description: Alert Albums are working with Tracks not with Songs. Under the hood it’s the same entity. Create or Link Track with Album This endpoint allows you to Link an Album -> Song relation or create a new Artist with Relation. If no id is provided a new Album will be created. POST /api/albums/{albumID}/tracks If the Track you want to link exists you can POST { "id": "1607d150-861c-4782-8c1b-abe58254373b" } If you want to create a new Album:
